Key Match Events: Glover bowled a slower legcutter third ball to hoodwink Rilee Rossouw in the tenth over
Glover bowled an on-pace short ball into the pitch and drew a top edge from Miller, with van der Merwe completing that sensational catch
Glover bowled one away from Parnell's swinging arc and scratched his outside edge
Pre-Game Insights: There is a strong South African influence in Netherlands' team, with players like Stephan Myburgh, Neil Wagner, Colin Ackermann, Roelof van der Merwe, and Brandon Glover
Ryan Campbell, the then-head coach of Netherlands, had noticed Glover in 2019 and convinced him to move to the Netherlands using his Dutch passport
Glover emerged as the joint-highest wicket-taker in T20I cricket in 2019, with 28 strikes in 16 matches at an economy rate of 6.50
Post-Match Reflections: Glover said, 'We were just waiting for that complete performance' and felt the team had finally gelled and played their best form of cricket
Glover suggested that this T20 World Cup might mark the end of Ryan Campbell's stint at Netherlands, and also hinted that Sunday's match might have been Myburgh's last for the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: Glover had first caught the attention of Ryan Campbell, the then-head coach of Netherlands, in 2019
Glover's performance showed that hard work pays off and he was raring to go the whole time
Netherlands now believe that they can cut it against the top teams in international cricket
